WorkItem.Description:
In my gradually getting T9 moonkin druid I've come across a bug where Insect Swarm has encountered a divide by zero bug.
 
I'll report it here for the Moonkin developer to be aware of in the meantime I'll look to hunt down where the bug is.
 
Levva
Rawr.Enhance Developer.

Comments.Message:
To view bug. Load the XML file and scroll down to Insect Swarm dps report figure. Note that the figure is NaN and the tootip shows 0.00 avg hit and 0 avg mana. 

I'm aware that my character is a work in progress and is not Raid hit capped, largely because I've not raided with him yet. The plan is to get rid of the 200 blues & epics before contemplating a raid by which time he will ofc be raid capped.

Meh, the difference between NaN and 0 dps is purely a display issue.  It's not like the internal calculations are going to bug out.

I should add that while I am going to fix it, it's actually been in there for a while; I've seen it before and have just been too lazy to get around to it.

No problem. I'm new to Moonkin stuff and noted it as a bug. Couldn't find a bug report that listed the issue so posted a ticket.

Enjoying my Moonkin and giving serious consideration to changing to Moonkin as main for Cata.
Fixed in latest source, should be in the next build.
